DOC.brief_summary: A trial of LaFlavon in Patients with Metabolic Syndrome to Evaluate its Effectiveness in Lowering Triglycerides and Raising High-Density Lipoprotein (HDL).
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Laflavon in Lowering Triglycerides and Raising High-Density Lipoprotein (HDL)
DOC.criteria: 1. Men and Women with Metabolic Syndrome 2. Elevated Triglycerides (> 150) 3. Low HighDensity Lipoprotein (HDL) (< 35) 4. Willingness to take study nutritional supplement once a day for 3 months 1. Women who are pregnant, nursing, or who intend pregnancy during the period of treatment 2. Known milk, soy or whey allergy
